document.full_text: sudan's northern army accused the south's forces on friday of attacking a convoy in the contested abyei region, and threatened to retaliate, escalating a dispute that looms over plans for the south's independence.
document.title: north sudan accuses south of convoy ambush in abyei
lines_and_colors: sudan's northern army accused the south's forces on friday of attacking a convoy in the contested abyei region, and threatened to retaliate, escalating a dispute that looms over plans for the south's independence.
